::Firearm::

Firearm, as a tank, isn't very frightened of the two cars flying at 
him and continues on driving. He aims both his turret and his side 
gun, firing a charge at Drag Strip and a missile at Wildrider and 
speeding up.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> A missile hits Drag Strip, sending him flying away from all the 
other melee
> fire, and he is sent straight towards Firearm thanks to the 
momentum.
> 
> As Wildrider drives towards Firearm, the shots start exploding 
around him,
> "holy cow" he screams, as a missile rearends him, and he is sent 
hurtling
> upwards. Instead of landing however he continues his movement 
towards
> Firearm, this time from the air though, giving him the momentum of 
gravity.
